Name: Spring in Tuscany
ArrangementDescription: A 6-day trip to Italy with excursions and full service.
TravelProgram: Day 1: Arrival, Day 2: Pisa, Lucca, Day 3: Cinque Terre, Day 4: San Gimignano, Sienna, Day 5: Firenze, Day 6: Return

Name: Winter Magic in Slovenia
ArrangementDescription: A 7-day ski package in Kranjska Gora with ski-pass and half-board service.
TravelProgram: Day 1: Arrival and hotel check-in, Day 2-6: Skiing and excursions(Bled, Ljubljana), Day 7: Return

Name: Summer Escape to Malta
ArrangementDescription: Discover the beauty of Malta with a full-board arrangement including excursions to historical sites and beaches.
TravelProgram: Day 1: Arrival and welcome dinner, Day 2: Valletta city tour, Day 3: Mdina and Rabat, Day 4: Gozo Island, Day 5: Beach day, Day 6: Free exploration, Day 7: Return
